function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordination and integration of research, data, and expertise across stakeholders and sectors","Impact":"Fragmented and delayed engagement, undermining the efficiency and effectiveness of pandemic response","Mitigation":"Establish mechanisms for coordinating and integrating research, data, and expertise across stakeholders and sectors in transparent ways","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, data sharing and integration tools","People":"Researchers, public health specialists, guideline developers, epidemiologists, data analysts, evaluation experts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inefficient dissemination of evidence to target audiences","Impact":"Failure to achieve desirable impact, ineffective policy response","Mitigation":"Leverage multiple dissemination channels tailored to different audiences, innovate KT platforms, adapt to the context and audience","Technologies":"Knowledge translation platforms, innovative dissemination channels","People":"Researchers, public health specialists, guideline developers, epidemiologists, data analysts, evaluation experts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, government agencies"}]}
